name: doubtfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows feelings of doubt: "Are you telling me the truth?" he asked doubtfully. Jamie looked at her doubtfully, wanting to believe her. See
doubtful
More examplesFewer examples"I don't think so," Ruth replied doubtfully.Benjamin shook his head doubtfully.I'm not sure what to think," Aubrey said doubtfully.
